item.title: DR Congo rebels killed 140 civilians despite peace process, rights group says
item.description: Attacks were carried out in more than a dozen villages last month, Human Rights Watch says.

item.title: Kremlin plays down Zelensky talks as Trump warns Putin may not want to make deal
item.description: The US president conceded the war in Ukraine was "tough to solve" after several days of high-level talks.

item.title: Family of NZ fugitive on the run with children pleads for return
item.description: Tom Phillips and his children have been missing since 2021, in a case that has gripped New Zealand.

item.title: Dozens of Afghan deportees from Iran killed in bus crash
item.description: At least 17 children were among those killed after the bus crashed and caught fire on its way to Kabul.

item.title: Heavy rain paralyses India's financial capital Mumbai
item.description: Nearly 600 people were rescued from a stalled monorail system and 350 others have been shifted to shelters.
